title: Wind whips destructive wildfires in New Mexico, Colorado - The Associated Press
content: Wind whips destructive wildfires in New Mexico, Colorado  The Associated PressView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Firefighters scouted the drought-stricken mountainsides around a New Mexico village on Wednesday as they looked for opportunities to slow a wind-driven wildfire that a day earlier had burned at least 150 homes and other structures while displacing thousands of residents and forcing the evacuation of two schools.
